page.title: 13Muchelney,walks and wildlife
page.content: On Sundays my sister,Dad and I sometimes go for a walk.We usually get up at 6 o'clock because there are usually more animals about and not enough wind to blow our scent towards them.There are many lovely walks around Muchelney.One of the best for seeing wild life is down Horsey Lane. This is a long narrow track with hedges on either side which are full of birds and animals.We often take field glasses down to the moors where we play a game called 'Name that bird'.We find this a very interesting way to recognise birds by their song as well as their appearance.If we wake early enough we often go down to the farm to help our Dad feed the animals.We give the calves hay and oats, which have been coated in malt to give extra vitamins.
